H0.text: what language does peru speak. Spanish

H1.text: what language does peru speak. Aymara

H2.text: what language does peru speak. Portuguese

H3.text: what language does peru speak. Quechua

A4.text: The majority of these languages are Indigenous, but the most common language is Spanish, the main language that about 94.4% of the population speaks.

A5.text: Quechua is the second language of Peru, in terms of number of speakers. It is the official language in areas where it is the dominant language

A6.text: Peru is one of the countries where Spanish is co-official with Quechua, Aymara, and other indigenous languages.
